name: Pokopo EZ Automatic Pet Feeder
imageAlt: Pokopo EZ automatic pet feeder with stainless steel bowl, 3.5L tank, and digital display
shortDescription: Automatically feed your pet on schedule — up to 6 meals a day with voice recording.
description: Never worry about your pet's mealtime again. The Pokopo EZ automatic pet feeder dispenses dry food on a precise schedule you set — up to 6 meals per day with portion control from 5g to 200g per meal. Record a 10-second voice message so your fur baby hears your voice at every feeding, even when you're away. Dual power supply (USB + D batteries) means it keeps working even during power outages. Perfect for busy pet parents in Singapore.
features: Programmable feeding schedule — up to 6 meals per day, settable by the minute
3.5L translucent food tank — easy to check remaining food at a glance
10-second voice recording — your pet eats to the comfort of your voice
Dual power supply — USB Type-A or 3x D batteries, auto-switches during power outages
Stainless steel bowl — hygienic, durable, and easy to wash
Locking lid mechanism — stays secure even if your pet pushes or bumps it
Built-in desiccant container — keeps dry food fresh longer
Removable washable tank — detaches for easy cleaning
